name: Beyond the Beans
description:
This is a stealth game where you play as a terrifying monster. You want a cup of coffee from a cafe down the street, but the CIA are on the block and looking for you. You are wearing a disguise, but anyone who looks too closely or for too long will notice it and the jig will be up!

Try to get to the end of the street while avoiding people. There are powerups on the way that can help you reach your destination, the cafe.

Controls:
